title: These pipes shall be run in shafts exclusively for this purpose and shall be on external walls, away from the staircases
clause_text: These pipes shall be run in shafts exclusively for this purpose and shall be on external walls, away from the staircases. There shall be no inter-connection between these shafts and the rest of the floors, Gas meters shall be housed in a suitable constructed metal cupboard located in a well-ventilated space at ground level.
